code: import axios from"@helpers/axios/public.axios";import{ALERT,AUTH}from"../../constants";export const recoverPassword=_ref=>{let{email}=_ref;return async dispatch=>{try{const response=await axios.post("/forgot",{email});const{message}=response.data;dispatch({type:ALERT.ALERT_SUCCESS,payload:message});return response.data.data;}catch(e){dispatch({type:AUTH.AUTH_ERROR,payload:e.response.data.message});throw e;}};};
